{{ProductPage|http://www.ruckuswireless.com/products/zoneflex-indoor/zoneflex-r700}} :[http://a030f85c1e25003d7609-b98377aee968aad08453374eb1df3398.r40.cf2.rackcdn.com/datasheets/ds-zoneflex-r700.pdf Datasheet] Much of the information (including used FCC IDs, OUIs, and CoO) in this entry is per '''Ruckus''''s datasheet. ==Additional information from the datasheet== *Dimensions (L x W x H): [[Dimensions::20.3 cm x 20.3 cm x 5 cm]] *Weight: [[Weight::2.25 lbs]]
